original_text: So Pharaoh called Abram and said, “What is this you have done to me? Why did you not tell me that she was your wife?
korean_text: 바로가 아브람을 불러서 이르되 네가 어찌하여 나에게 이렇게 행하였느냐 네가 어찌하여 그를 네 아내라고 내게 말하지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: So Pharaoh called Abram and said,
What is this you have done to me?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 내게 이렇게 한 것이 무엇이냐?

sentences.original_text: Why did you not tell me
